names.pinyin: dang gui bei mu ku shen wan
names.english: dang gui, fritillaria and sophora pills
names.commonEnglish: Dang Gui, Fritillaria and Sophora Pills

actions: Tonifies, invigorates and harmonizes the Blood, disperses Cold, regulates the menses, stops coughing and treats dyspnea.
Clears Heat, transforms Phlegm, stops coughing and nourishes and moistens the Lungs.
With Dang Gui and Ku Shen, for urinary difficulty during pregnancy with a normal appetite.
Clears Heat, dries Dampness and promotes urination.

syndromes: Damp-Heat in the Lower Jiao with Qi Stagnation and Blood Deficiency

symptoms: Painful, dark yellow or reddish, short urination
A bitter taste in the mouth
